attributes.title: no❤️
attributes.review: terrible for not only the economy and political sanctions, but for life itself.

attributes.title: Horrible and disgusting app ever
attributes.review: This app is horrible and trash... -1000 out of 10

attributes.title: To the best president you could ask for
attributes.review: I really wanted to support my non racist,very kind non homophobic,msogynist,Orange president but it’s hard when you just have a terrible app that isn’t functional. Sure would be a shame to also ban an app for kids to have fun but I guess we can’t be happy either because of a grumpy president that couldn’t have his rally as he wanted :(

attributes.title: Extremely Disappointed
attributes.review: This app took forever to load and then once it did it just CRASHED OVER AND OVER AGAIN !! I genuinely wanted to use it and now I’m just disappointed. Please remove this app.

attributes.title: This app almost raped me.
attributes.review: So I downloaded the app and it was all fine and dandy till like one day I was sleeping peacefully just to realize I was having a sleep paralysis. An orange and pumpkin mixture kept trying to feed me Cheetos and hump me. Just when I thought it was over..... OMG I AM SOO EMOTIONAL RIGHT NOW..... HE TRIED TO FEED ME PUMPKIN FLAVORED CHEETOS and make me vote for him!!!! I was like NOOOOO!!!! I am on a diet but he wouldn’t stop so I had to delete the app and leave a review. Now I have to see a therapist. I hope y’all run me my trauma check. Thanks and have a lovely day.

attributes.title: no ❤️
attributes.review: If I could give app 0 stars I would. when I opened the app it immediately drowned me with several questions INCLUDING asking for my location. like no ❤️ not only that but it asked for my ethnicity. like huh? why does it need to know that. anyway worst experience EVER. DO NOT AND I MEAN DO NOT RECOMMEND TO A FRIEND! 0/10.

attributes.title: Don’t get this🙄just don’t Karen😒😪
attributes.review: I got the app and it literally asked me for inappropriate things and asked if I was a 13 year old!!They said they would send a man that looked like a Cheeto and as a white women I do not recommend this app really scares me so does that person that shows  us.
Total wast of time worse than Fox News

attributes.title: It’s not a good app
attributes.review: I got this app because why not ? And it’s a waste of  time and Storage on your phone so this should be deleted on the App Store
